WordText: Industry is the economic backbone of every country. Today, industrial sectors around the world are enriched with technological innovations. Energy, automotive, robotics, and chemical industries are experiencing rapid growth. Each industrial sector contributes to economic development and is evolving with innovative approaches.
Z: New technologies and modern manufacturing processes are driving rapid industrial development.
Texts: Local products are being introduced to foreign markets, with export volumes increasing year by year.
A: Through innovation centers, science is being applied to industry.
